headline.main: Benjamin Spock, World's Pediatrician, Dies at 94

abstract: Dr Benjamin Spock, noted pediatrician who gently coached anxious postwar parents to trust common sense in caring for children but was blamed by critics for self-indulgence of 60's generation, dies at age 94; his homey handbook, Dr Spock's Baby and Child Care, was one of bestsellers of all time for more than 50 years; photos (L)
snippet: Dr. Benjamin Spock, the pediatrician who gently coached anxious postwar parents to trust their ''own common sense,'' only to be blamed by some critics for the self-indulgence of those parents' children, the 60's generation, died on Sunday at his h...
